alert.note: Alert for Motley (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lubbock (Lubbock and South Plains Texas)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued December 14 at 2:43AM CST until December 15 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Lubbock
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR THE EXTREME SOUTHERN TEXAS PANHANDLE, NORTHWESTERN ROLLING PLAINS, AND THE SOUTH PLAINS... The National Weather Service in Lubbock has issued a Fire Weather Watch, which is in effect Wednesday afternoon. * Timing...Noon until 6 PM Wednesday. * Wind...West-southwest 25 to 35 mph with gusts to 55 mph. * Humidity...As low as 15 percent. * Fuels...Critically dry. * Impacts...Any fires that develop can spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is discouraged.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Monitor later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
